name: QuickGig
description: A micro-task platform enabling users to earn or hire with secure payments and real-time management.

name: PlateShare
description: A platform connecting donors and recipients for efficient food donation with secure, location-based features.

name: CineVault
description: A platform for exploring, viewing detailed movie information, and managing favorites. Users can add, delete, and organize their movie collections for an engaging entertainment experience.

name: Peddy
description: An online platform to choose and adopt pets easily.

name: GadgetHeaven
description: A tech store featuring gadgets with a wishlist and cart system.

name: Eco Tales
description: A blog showcasing eco-adventure experiences for nature lovers.
